This Privacy Policy explains how PatternAI, Inc. and its affiliates ("PatternAI") collect, use, and disclose information you provide to us or which we otherwise collect in providing products or services to you ("Information"), including "Personal Data" by which we mean information that allows us to determine your identity when you engage with us.
We may disclose Information to our affiliates and partners subject to this Privacy Policy in order for them to support and service our Offerings.
We may disclose contact and account Information to our partners and event sponsors (identified at time of registration or event participation) pursuant to written agreements with confidentiality, privacy and security obligations.
We may share this Information with our affiliates, vendors and partners who help us service your account and with whom we have written agreements protecting the confidentiality, privacy, and security of your Information.

How PatternAI Shares Your Information

Privacy Policy

How to Access and Control Your Information
We collect Information via cookies and like technologies as set forth in the PatternAI Cookie Policy to fulfill our legitimate interest in operating our website, making it easy to navigate, enriching the available content and offering information tailored to your interests.
We may disclose Information as necessary or appropriate under applicable laws (including laws outside your country of residence) to: comply with legal process or requirements; respond to requests from public or government authorities (including those outside your country of residence); enforce our terms and conditions; and protect our operations, rights and safety, and that of you and others, as needed.
We may disclose Information in the event of a proposed or actual corporate or financing transaction, such as a reorganization, merger, sale, joint venture, assignment, transfer, or disposition of all or any portion of PatternAI business, assets, or stock (including Information regarding any bankruptcy or similar proceedings).
We may disclose Information to other users of the service in aggregated format, provided it does not include Personal Data (except as noted for select AI Offerings).
We may disclose Information to our affiliates and partners subject to this Privacy Policy in order for them to support and service our Offerings.
We may disclose Information to our service providers (e.g., infrastructure as a service, order fulfillment, email providers, data warehouses, professional/customer/support services), pursuant to written agreements with confidentiality, privacy, and security obligations.
We may share this Information with our affiliates, vendors and partners who help us service your account and with whom we have written agreements protecting the confidentiality, privacy, and security of your Information.
We retain your Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or not prohibited by applicable law.
We use this information to validate accounts and automate license verification.

PatternAI collects data generated from the use and performance of Apps that interoperate with PatternAI Offerings, such as crash information, version, session duration, and user engagement (e.g., number of downloads, active/licensed users, and log-ins).

Privacy Policy

Interactions

We collect Information about you from other sources such as public databases, joint business partners, social media platforms, conference/event hosts, and partners when you interact with them.

PatternAI uses Information it collects from your Interactions to deliver services to you in accordance with our terms, to fulfill our legal obligations, or to conduct necessary business activities (sometimes called "legitimate interests"), as described below.
